languages.text: "Мы целы и живы... Все наладится, так ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "Мы целы и живы... Все наладится, так ведь?"

languages.text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"
languages.original_text: "Мы целы и живы... Все наладится, так ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"
"We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"
"We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"
"We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"
"We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"
"We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

languages.text: "Wir sind noch in einem Stück ... Alles kommt wieder in Ordnung, oder?"
languages.original_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind noch in einem Stück ... Alles kommt wieder in Ordnung, oder?"

languages.text: « Nous sommes indemnes... Tout ira bien, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes indemnes... Tout ira bien, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: “我们全都安然无恙……一切都会好起来的，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

traits.locale_text: “我们全都安然无恙……一切都会好起来的，不是吗？”

languages.text: 「私たちは無事だった…きっと何ごとも上手くいくさ、そうだろ？」
languages.original_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは無事だった…きっと何ごとも上手くいくさ、そうだろ？」

languages.text: «Todavía estamos enteros... No nos pasará nada, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

traits.locale_text: «Todavía estamos enteros... No nos pasará nada, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: "Sağ salim atlattık. Her şey yoluna girecek, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "We're in one piece... Everything will be all right, won't it?"

traits.locale_text: "Sağ salim atlattık. Her şey yoluna girecek, değil mi?"
